title: Unable to spawn more than one vehicle of a given type (X1, X4, etc)

content.raw: We are trying to spawn multiple X4-type vehicles.  What we have found is that if we so much as change the name "X4" in the launch file to something else (e.g., "X4A"), everything breaks and we can't even launch the mav in gazebo.  I am attaching the messages printed in the gazebo terminal after simply changing the name from X4 to X4A.  It appears that a lot of things were hard-coded in the urdf files that should be using a namespace instead.  Maybe the answer for now is to copy the x4_description to another folder and change all of the instances of X4 to X4A, but that seems klugey.

What we have found is that if we so much as change the name "X4" in the launch file to something else (e.g., "X4A"), everything breaks and we can't even launch the mav in gazebo. I am attaching the messages printed in the gazebo terminal after simply changing the name from X4 to X4A. It appears that a lot of things were hard-coded in the urdf files that should be using a namespace instead. Maybe the answer for now is to copy the x4_description to another folder and change all of the instances of X4 to X4A, but that seems klugey.
